# Update Annual Reports

## read in functions (run this first)

```{r}
source(here::here('admin/import_scripts.R'))
```

## generate figures

```{r}
create_figs(group = c('cwq'))
```

##  create pdfs

### all reports (run as-is)

```{r}
quarto::quarto_render(
  profile = 'pdfs'
)
```

### specific reports (type name in between `c()`)

```{r}
render_reports(programs = c('phyto'),
               report_type = 'pdf')
```

## update website

**WARNING:** after running, once pushed to the GitHub 'gh-pages' branch, website *will* be updated

### all reports (run as-is)

```{r}
quarto::quarto_render(
  profile = 'website',
  as_job = TRUE
)
```

### specific reports (type name in between `c()`)

```{r}
render_reports(programs = c('phyto'),
               report_type = 'website')
```
